snippet: Nov 3, 2022 ... BUCHA, Ukraine (AP) — The first man arrived at 7:27 a.m. Russian ... soldiers picked up during a March 4, 2022 sweep of Bucha, Ukraine, ...
htmlSnippet: Nov 3, 2022 ... BUCHA, Ukraine (AP) — The first man arrived at 7:27 a.m. Russian ... soldiers picked up during a March 4, 2022 sweep of Bucha, Ukraine, ...

metatags.og:description: BUCHA, Ukraine (AP) — The first man arrived at 7:27 a.m. Russian soldiers covered his head and marched him up the driveway toward a nondescript office building. Two minutes later, a pleading, gagged voice pierced the morning stillness.

metatags.og:title: How Russian Soldiers Ran a "Cleansing" Operation in Bucha, Ukraine | FRONTLINE
metatags.og:description: Hours of CCTV footage and intercepts of audio calls by Russian soldiers obtained by Associated Press and FRONTLINE show for the first time what a Russian "cleansing" operation looked like.
metatags.twitter:description: "I’ve already killed so many civilians,” a Russian soldier told his wife from Bucha, Ukraine. The Associated Press and FRONTLINE obtained hundreds of hours of CCTV footage and intercepts of audio

title: Russia scrubs Mariupol's Ukraine identity, builds on death | AP News
htmlTitle: Russia scrubs Mariupol's Ukraine identity, builds on death | AP News
snippet: Dec 22, 2022 ... Throughout Mariupol, Russian workers are tearing down bombed-out buildings at a ... At left, this pre-war photo provided by the family shows ...
htmlSnippet: Dec 22, 2022 ... Throughout Mariupol, Russian workers are tearing down bombed-out buildings at a ... At left, this pre-war photo provided by the family shows ...

metatags.og:description: Throughout Mariupol, Russian workers are tearing down bombed-out buildings at a rate of at least one a day, hauling away shattered bodies with the debris. Russian military convoys are rumbling down the broad avenues of what is swiftly becoming a garrison city, and Russian soldiers, builders, administrators and doctors are replacing the tens of thousands of Ukrainians who have died or left.
metatags.twitter:title: Russia scrubs Mariupol's Ukraine identity, builds on death

Thank you very much.  It’s a great honor to be here.  Mr. President, they tell me you’re over there somewhere.  There you…
